title: SHAKE_CINEMATIC_CAM
content:
0xDCE214D9ED58F3CF0x61815F31// ShakeCinematicCam
void SHAKE_CINEMATIC_CAM(char* shakeName, float intensity);Parameters:shakeName: The name of the shake.intensity: The intensity of the shake.See SHAKE_GAMEPLAY_CAM for a full list of camera shakes.
